Tensor Reel

class mvdatasets.utils.tensor_reel.TensorReel(cameras: list[Camera], device: str = 'cuda', verbose: bool = False, modalities: list[str] = ['rgbs', 'masks'])
get_next_rays_batch(batch_size: int = 512, cameras_idx: ndarray = None, frames_idx: ndarray = None, jitter_pixels: bool = False, nr_rays_per_pixel: int = 1)

Sample a batch of rays from the tensor reel.

Parameters:

  • batch_size (int, optional) – Defaults to 512.

  • cameras_idx (np.ndarray, optional) –

    1. Defaults to None.

  • frames_idx (np.ndarray, optional) –

    1. Defaults to None.

  • jitter_pixels (bool, optional) – Defaults to False.

  • nr_rays_per_pixel (int, optional) – Defaults to 1.

Returns:

(batch_size) frames_idx (np.ndarray): (batch_size) rays_o (torch.Tensor): (batch_size, 3) rays_d (torch.Tensor): (batch_size, 3) vals (dict): “modality” (torch.Tensor): (batch_size, H, W, C) timestamps (torch.Tensor): (batch_size)

Return type:

cameras_idx (np.ndarray)
